entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
